title: Rewriting the Present | Guest Host: Jeff Katz | Guests: Winsome Sears, Tom Ziglar, & Alan Dershowitz | 12/28/21
description:
Radio host Jeff Katz guest host the Glenn Beck Program. The media wants to change the meaning of a widely known saying, what do they say it really means? Virginia Lt. Governor-Elect Winsome Sears joins the show and speaks on the racism the left tries to disguise, do they care about our children? And what are Americans’ true feelings about transgenders in schools? Tom Ziglar joins the show to speak on the Great Resignation and the state of employment in America. Then, Harvard Professor Alan Dershowitz joins the to speak on the Kim Potter verdict.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
